acceptedAnswer.text: LeadFormHub is a verified lead capture platform built for Indian businesses. It helps agencies, B2B startups, sales teams, and marketers collect qualified leads through branded forms with optional mobile OTP verification and a centralized lead dashboard.

mainEntity.name: Is LeadFormHub a form builder or a lead capture platform?

acceptedAnswer.text: LeadFormHub is a lead capture platform, not a general form builder. It focuses on capturing and verifying leads for sales and marketing, with features like OTP verification and a centralized dashboard designed for lead management.

When a visitor submits a form, they receive a one-time password on their mobile number. They enter the code to confirm their identity. Only submissions that complete this step are stored as verified leads in your dashboard.

No. OTP verification is optional and configurable per form. Enable it where lead quality matters most, such as demo requests or high-value offers. Leave it off for low-friction forms like newsletter signups.

mainEntity.name: Can I create branded forms with my own URL?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. LeadFormHub supports branded lead capture forms with your own domain or custom URL. Forms can be shared via link or embedded on your site for a consistent brand experience.

mainEntity.name: How quickly can I set up a form?

acceptedAnswer.text: Most teams are live in minutes. Sign up, create a form, and share the link or embed it. OTP and additional settings require only a few more steps.

mainEntity.name: Does LeadFormHub support Indian payment methods?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. LeadFormHub offers monthly pricing in INR and supports UPI, cards, and net banking. No international payment or currency conversion is required for Indian teams.
Yes. LeadFormHub is built for agencies managing multiple clients. The centralized dashboard, branded forms, and verified lead capture help agencies deliver quality leads and scale operations.

mainEntity.name: Can I export leads from LeadFormHub?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. You can export leads from the centralized dashboard. Export and CSV options make it straightforward to move leads into LeadFormHub or out to your CRM or other tools.
LeadFormHub offers integrations for common workflows. You can export leads via CSV and connect with other tools. Check the integrations page for the latest supported platforms and APIs.

mainEntity.name: How secure is my lead data?

acceptedAnswer.text: Lead data is stored in secure, access-controlled environments. Data in transit and at rest is encrypted, and access is limited and logged. We design with Indian data and privacy expectations in mind.
LeadFormHub offers a free tier to get started. Check the pricing page for current plan details and limits.
LeadFormHub uses monthly pricing in INR. You pay each month for the plan you choose. Clear billing with no hidden fees. Upgrade or change plans as your needs change.

mainEntity.name: Can I upgrade my plan later?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. You can upgrade when you need more leads, OTP verifications, or integrations. Your hub and data carry over. You can also downgrade or change options as your needs evolve.

mainEntity.name: Does LeadFormHub work without a CRM?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. LeadFormHub works as a standalone lead capture platform. The centralized dashboard lets you view, manage, and export leads without a CRM. You can add CRM integrations when needed.
